code: import axios from"axios";import{GET_TRANSACTIONS,ADD_TRANSACTION,DELETE_TRANSACTION,GET_STATS,TRANSACTIONS_LOADING}from"./types";export var getTransactions=function getTransactions(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setTransLoading());axios.get('/api/transactions').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_TRANSACTIONS,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteTransaction=function deleteTransaction(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/transactions/".concat(id)).then(function(res){dispatch({type:DELETE_TRANSACTION,payload:id});});};};export var addTransaction=function addTransaction(transaction){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/transactions",transaction).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_TRANSACTION,payload:res.data});});};};export var getStats=function getStats(){return{type:GET_STATS};};export var setTransLoading=function setTransLoading(){return{type:TRANSACTIONS_LOADING};};
